@dropthep @gilliandthomson I do indeed know. 1836 I think is when he invented it. Fun fact: the first sax he made was the gigantic bass sax

Haha it's a joke! Nobody gets tired of free-jazz! #EasyListening am I right?
Sometimes I just need a break from free-jazz, you know?

Just saw a little kid dressed as Santa with a machete in his mouth, super weird.
Halloween is TOMORROW, kid.
"Don't kill people. It's just too much trouble for what it's worth." The advice I give my students in their lessons.
My phone just tried to auto-correct a typo into an emoji...
Fred Durst feat. Matty B Raps
Hey @CrossyRoad, just spent 5100g (that's 51 tries) on the prize machine and still didn't get any new characters. Glitch? Or terrible luck?
Just saw a bird and plane in the sky. They looked significantly different from each other. Neither could've been mistaken for a flying man.
@Geektox Waaaaaait, I don't recall having SoundCloud automatically post to my Twitter... Although it IS a very good #sound

You always see lost dog posters with the gender of the pet but do they ever consider what gender the dog IDENTIFIES as?
You know what's even better than pop music? 10 year olds singing pop music.
This is for @Geektox #wert
Had an 11 hour rehearsal yesterday. It was exhausting. Good thing today only has 13 hours of teaching, recording, and performing.
Watching @TheMuppets videos while waiting for things to finish exporting. This is what we call "work" in the film business.
@Geektox where is this from? I feel like I should see this movie.
Played jazz and punk rock for two different bands at two different shows last night. Gotta love being an open minded musician.
@Geektox its the best jam.
@Geektox @ItsKyleMc They were incredible.
Hey @weirdestband, the other night my sqwonk-noise band #KeyToAbyss opened for Weirdest Band golden boy @a_n_p It was incredible.

@Geektox, @EyesofErin is always arguing about stuff. She would probably fit in well.

@Geektox and not wussy BotB like judges vote for you, no, you gotta be better than the other band. Faster. Louder. Crazier. Out play them.
@Geektox Ok 100% serious can we do this? There's been a few that have tried, but let's do it here.
@Geektox I would get home, I would smell it, then I would immediately turn around and go to Subway.
Fun fact: @CBCVancouver and I are Twitter BFFs.
@Geektox @CBCVancouver What do you guys think?
Today I'm recording at @100Powell for @JoshRamsay Am I a famous studio musician now?
If @CBCVancouver says I'm a celebrity then it must be true. You heard it here first, folks! https://t.co/JptixgxEde
@eddylureport @CBCVancouver It's official. I guess I can start referring to myself as "Mike Allen, Celebrity"
Just did a short interview for @CBCVancouver with @VVagabonds Am I a rockstar yet?
@coastaljazz I also see nothing on the website... What are the dates?
Spongebob is the only fry cook at the Krusty Krab, so how does he walk into work so many times where people are already eating?
Wow, I don't think I've ever been happier to see someone get off a bus. That's the end of tonight's episode of #ShittyBusRapper
Dude is literally just yelling shit on the bus and rhyming a couple words every so often. #ShittyBusRapper
No, don't clap for him, you'll encourage him to keep going. #ShittyBusRapper
Or maybe it's Italian? Hard to tell, he's very drunk. #ShittyBusRapper
Now he's rapping in Spanish? #ShittyBusRapper
Remember that bad freestyle rapper from a few days ago? He's rapping at me now. Still bad. Still loud. Mostly bad. #buslife
I typo'd while typing "check" and wrote "ceck" which my phone then autocorrected, not to "check" but to "McDicks" Cuz why not, right?
Never mind, the best part of Top 5 was @DMX singing. Wow. Just wow.
The best part about Top 5 is @JerrySeinfeld in a strip club. #OutOfYourElement
Dude's been freestyle rapping (badly and loudly) on the bus now for about 10 minutes straight. #buslife

D'Angelo cannot be properly hashtag'd. Not sure if this is a genius move or a foolish one... #D'Angelo? #DAngelo? Wrong!
